Boolean.Name: Suppress Startup Banner
Boolean.Description: Suppresses the display of the startup banner and information messages.

Boolean.Name: Verbose Output
Boolean.Description: Displays additional information during manifest generation.

String.Name: Assembly Identity
String.Description: Specifies the attributes of the assemblyIdentity element in the manifest.

Boolean.Name: Use Unicode Response Files
Boolean.Description: Instructs the project system to generate UNICODE response files when spawning the manifest tool. Set this property to Yes when files in the project have UNICODE paths.

Boolean.Name: Use FAT32 Workaround
Boolean.Description: Work-around file timestamp issues on FAT32 drives, to let the manifest tool update correctly.

String.Name: Additional Manifest Files
String.Description: Specifies the additional user manifest fragment files to merge into the manifest.

String.Name: Input Resource Manifests
String.Description: Specifies the input manifest stored as resources.

Boolean.Name: Embed Manifest
Boolean.Description: Specifies if the manifest file should be embedded in the assembly or created as a stand-alone file.

String.Name: Output Manifest File
String.Description: Specifies the output manifest file if the manifest is not embedded in the assembly.

String.Name: Manifest Resource File
String.Description: Specifies the output resources file used to embed the manifest into the project output.

String.Name: Dependency Information File
String.Description: Specifies the dependency information file used by Visual Studio to track build dependency information for the manifest tool.

String.Name: Type Library File
String.Description: Specifies the type library to use for regfree COM manifest support.

String.Name: Registrar Script File
String.Description: Specifies the register script file to use for regfree COM manifest support.

String.Name: Component File Name
String.Description: Specifies the file name of the component that is built from the .rgs or .tlb specifies.

String.Name: Replacements File
String.Description: Specifies the XML replacement file used to replace strings in the .rgs file.

Boolean.Name: Update File Hashes
Boolean.Description: Specifies if the file hashes should be updated.

String.Name: Update File Hashes Search Path
String.Description: Specifies the search path to use when updating file hashes.
